attributes.review: THIS IS THE WORST APP I HAVE EVER DOWNLOADED!!! 😡 First of all it took forever and i don’t know how if my WiFi connection is astronomical. Once I was able to open the app my phone caught on fire and it exploded. Your lucky I was planning on getting a new phone anyway but still. And that wasn’t the worst thing my frog was next to my phone when it happened and now I have to pick up pieces of my frog off my walls and carpet 😭😭😭 I was able to replace my phone but I can never replace Kermit my frog 😭 now I have to go plan a funeral
attributes.title: Disgusting

attributes.review: This is the worst app I have ever download. Y’all might think it’s a kid writing this review but no. TRUMP 2020 IN A COFFIN. I don’t even know how people can support Donald Trump when he had make this year even worst. Everyone warn him about COVID-19 and he didn’t do nothing about it. He was gonna start a war! Like wth, he only has been our president for 4 years and all of this happened. I DON’T WANNA RISK ANOTHER 4 YEARS. This gonna get even worst if his our president. Y’all not gonna let that happen. I rate this a 1 and y’all should too!
attributes.title: I can’t handle this

attributes.review: Let’s start off with how bad the app functions. It took 4 hours to download even though I have perfectly good Wifi. On top of that the app runs extremely slow AND every time I open the app this ugly orange face pops up on my screen, looks something like this—>🤡🍊.  That’s all just wanted to let y’all know this app is terrible, possibly the worst app ever made and it barely functions✨😌.  Oh yeah and it would be appreciated if you could let our kids out of those cages, Abolish ice✨😘🇲🇽
attributes.title: Terrible app

attributes.review: I wanted to download this amazing app to support our 🍊 rapist president 🥰 but it took hours of downloading 😒 it was really slow just like our president. Once it finally was installed I decided to open this amazing app 😁just to find a horrifying photo 😖 it took weeks to get out of my head.😭 I recommend to never download this app and never trust a racist, sexist, homophobic,ignorant man or this app that he created .🖤This was the worst experience ever and I wouldn’t want anyone to go through this traumatizing experience . 🧚🏻‍♀️
attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD WORST APP EVER!!!!

attributes.review: I am 20 years old and i was trump 2020 some months ago i downloaded this app to see what’s in it. it glitches. i try to do see some stuff they have and when i click it my phone goes back to home screen and no it’s my phone i just got the 11. This is app is the most horrible app i’ve gotten it doesn’t matter i was a trump support it’s A bad app and i think i got a virus because everything i see in safari is trump and i’ve never search that up so take this app away
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP

attributes.review: Trying to navigate through the set up of this app was so complicated and the amount of ADS through it was just ridiculous! For a billionaire Trump is really doing the most to make some change am I right !? In fact, there was even an AD for an X-rated website! How disgusting, as a mother I would NOT let my kids anywhere near this app and and mortified at any children who might’ve stumbled across it. This man is going to negatively influence the youth in the worst possible way, DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!
attributes.title: Not helpful AT ALL!

attributes.review: I want to download the app to see what was going on with our president and when I opened the app I saw a big orange on my screen and I screamed and threw my phone And my phone hit my window and then my window shattered on my mom’s head and then my mom couldn’t see so she ran into my brother and my brother broke his leg and then my other brother accidentally tripped over his leg and then my sister came out the to see what’s going on and she fell on her face and this is why you should not download the app
attributes.title: Terrible app

attributes.review: Unfortunately this app has not meet my expectations. It is completely a bird and crashes constantly. When downloading this application it took an abundance amount of time to download . Then once I open the open it would stay for a minute or two then completely get me out of the app. It only did this to this particular app. Every  other app was completely fine. This app is horrible  should be removed. 1 star rating to this trump app.
attributes.title: need to update it’s whole app

attributes.review: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!🤬 i heard a bunch of people talking about  this app so i decided to cave in and download it. WORST MISTAKE OF MY LIFE❌ this app took days to download and caused my phone to break and now i’m homeless with 5 kids living behind a mcdonalds😪💔 this orange president stole all my money and broke into my house and drop kicked my grandma all bc i tried deleting the app I AM ASTONISHED!! he also stares at me threw my window and throws cockroaches on me while i am SLEEPING! 😡 THIS IS NOT OK! we need this app off of the app store IMMEDIATELY! once again do not downloaded this app. bye🥰🤪🧚🏼✨💗
attributes.title: I AM TRAUMATIZED😤😤😡😡🤬

attributes.review: Like any rational human I wanted to download this amazing app. Sadly the app is super glitchy and makes weird noises when you try to open and run it. The whole thing needs a system update ASAP. It’s really slow once it loads but the noises don’t stop. It’s constantly exiting out the app on its own and shows an error message. Don’t recommend this app at all, seems like a good app but it’s all just looks. Don’t waste your time downloading and if you do it better be to leave a 1 star review.
attributes.title: Terrible 😭
